definition: only met with once every hundred years (drought, flood etc)
a project of vital and lasting importance
may you live a long and happy life together (wedding greeting)
It takes ten years to nurture a tree, but a hundred years to train a man (idiom)/fig. a good education program takes a long time to develop/cf. 十年樹木，百年樹人|十年树木，百年树人
five hundred years ago we were the same family (idiom) (said of persons with the same surname)
pinyin: wu3 bai3 nian2 qian2 shi4 yi1 jia1

definition: It takes ten years to nurture a tree, but a hundred years to train a man (idiom). A good education program takes a long time to develop.
pinyin: shi2 nian2 shu4 mu4 , bai3 nian2 shu4 ren2

sentences.chinese: 樹民族品牌，立百年基業。

sentences.english: This, however, happens only during the first hundred years of their damnation.
sentences.chinese: 這種情況只發生在他們進地獄的頭一百年。

sentences.english: Be known as " cork is regnal " Portuguese the cork that already had hundred years is produced history.
sentences.chinese: 被譽爲“軟木王國”的葡萄牙已有百年的軟木生產史。

sentences.english: Descended in part from Inca colonists sent here more than 500 years ago, the inhabitants of Taquile keep the old ways.
sentences.chinese: 部分居民是五百年前殖民者的後裔。

sentences.english: Society has changed a lot in the last hundred years.
sentences.chinese: 近百年來社會發生了很大的變化。

sentences.english: Hundred Years' Translation Movement began to arise in Abbasid Dynasty of Arab in the Middle Ages.
sentences.chinese: 百年翻譯運動興起於中世紀阿拉伯的阿拔斯王朝。

sentences.english: For a hundred years, I am the premier to perceive big have no mutually the human of hand.
sentences.chinese: 百年來，我是第一位參透大無相手的人。

sentences.english: Feminine cinema aesthetics is undoubtedly a great contribution to the cinematographic art of this century.
sentences.chinese: 女性電影美學無疑是對百年的電影藝術的一大貢獻。

sentences.english: And Serug lived after he begat Nahor two hundred years, and begat sons and daughters.
sentences.chinese: 西鹿生拿鶴之後，又活了二百年，並且生兒養女。

sentences.english: The piano is a keyboard instrument with a history of over 200 years.
sentences.chinese: 鋼琴是一種鍵盤樂器，其歷史在二百年以上。

sentences.english: Solar cookers, or ovens , have been used for centuries.
sentences.chinese: 太陽能飲具或爐竈已經被用了幾百年。

sentences.english: Buddha said, glancing back for 500 years in the preexistence could get the meeting today.
sentences.chinese: 佛說，前世五百年的回眸，才換作今生的偶遇。

sentences.english: His forefather was abducted to America two centuries ago.
sentences.chinese: 他的祖先是兩百年前被綁架到美洲的。

sentences.english: After Seth was born, Adam lived 800 years and had other sons and daughters.
sentences.chinese: 亞當生塞特之後，又在世八百年，並且生兒養女。

sentences.english: The first evidence that ancient people had moved to Mesa Verde is from about the year five hundred.
sentences.chinese: 古人移居到梅沙而第的第一個證據來自公元五百年。

sentences.english: Najinski could do ten, but that only happens once in a century .
sentences.chinese: 納金斯基能做十次，但那種人一百年只能出現一個。

from generation to generation/generation after generation
